findings.title: Owner can change router and bnbPoolAddress addresses
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify router and bnbPoolAddress addresses.

findings.title: Owner can change swapCoolDownTime
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the swap cool down time.

findings.title: Owner can end presale
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to end the presale.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from fees
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain entities or transactions from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change fees
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify fees which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change max transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum allowed transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can change number of tokens to swap
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the number of tokens to swap, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can manually approve for router
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to manually approve for the router.

findings.title: BNBHPool owner can change bnbHeroAddress
findings.description: The BNBHPool owner has the privilege to modify the bnbHeroAddress.

findings.title: BnbHeroAddress can withdraw BNBs
findings.description: The BnbHeroAddress has the privilege to withdraw BNBs.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.
